QuestData.Title: Bring Down the Warbringer!
QuestData.Description: We've made a lot of progress against the Shadow Council here at the Deathforge, but now it's time to finish the job.$B$BI found a key among the items in Kagrosh's pack. At least he accomplished something before they got to him.$B$BThe key should help you to track down this Warbringer Razuun you observed at Legion Hold.$B$BAfter you've hunted down and dealt with Warbringer Razuun, report directly to Blood Guard Gulmok. We must not keep him waiting.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Warbringer Razuun, recover Razuun's Orders, and report to Blood Guard Gulmok at Shadowmoon Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: What news do you bring from the Deathforge?
QuestData.RewardText: <You make your report to the blood guard and hand over the captured orders.>$B$BGood work, $N, but don't go thinking you'll be getting any ribbons for it. Let the night elves decorate their pretty little uniforms if they wish. Real warriors share tales of battle over a mug of ale.
